Title: Fuel System Function
Rationale: Primary fuel system function for hydrogen-electric propulsion

Title: Single Failure Tolerance
Rationale: Airworthiness requirement for transport category aircraft (CS-25.951b)

Title: Fuel Quantity Accuracy
Rationale: Required for flight planning and safe operations

Title: Boil-Off Management
Rationale: Minimize fuel loss and maintain operational efficiency (≤2% per 24h ground; ≤0.5% per flight hour)

Title: C2 Cell Integration
Rationale: C2 technology enables low boil-off LH₂ storage

Title: H₂ Leak Detection
Rationale: Early leak detection prevents flammability hazard (alarm at ≤25% LFL = 1% H₂ vol)

Title: Emergency Fuel Jettison
Rationale: Emergency landing capability (MTOW to MLW in 15 min)
